divs: Sighting DetailsFlickering object, fading and brightening, dripping fire, then dissapeared. directly east of my location,up pretty high at least a mile away, lasted 5 minutes. Appeared to be north of airliners flying out of ontario international from my perspective. Chinese lantern???
trends: There have been 9 other sightings in Azusa
There were no other sightings in Azusa on or around October 15th 2011
